faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions and Legal Terms

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.description: To use our services, you must be at least 18 years old and possess a valid and current motorcycle driver's license. By registering on our site and using our services, you guarantee that you meet these requirements.

reservation.title: Reservation Process
reservation.description: Motorcycle reservations are made through our website. You must provide truthful and up-to-date information during the reservation process. We reserve the right to cancel any reservation that contains incorrect or incomplete information.

rates.title: Rates and Payments
rates.description: Motorcycle rental rates are detailed on our website and may vary depending on the motorcycle model and rental duration. Payments will be made at the time of reservation using the accepted payment methods. We reserve the right to change our rates at any time, although confirmed reservations will not be affected by such changes.

usage.title: Motorcycle Usage
usage.description: The renter agrees to use the motorcycle responsibly and in compliance with all applicable traffic laws. Using the motorcycle for competitions, racing, off-road, or any other activity that may damage the motorcycle is prohibited. Any damage caused by improper use of the motorcycle will be the renter's responsibility.

insurance.title: Insurance and Coverage
insurance.description: We offer optional insurance that covers certain types of damages and liabilities. It is recommended to review the available insurance options and select the coverage that best suits your needs. The renter is responsible for any damage or loss not covered by the insurance.

return.title: Motorcycle Return
return.description: The motorcycle must be returned on the agreed date and time, in the same condition as it was delivered, with all accessories and documents. Any delay in returning the motorcycle may result in additional charges. If the motorcycle is returned with damages, the repair costs will be assessed and charged accordingly.

cancellation.title: Cancellations and Refunds
cancellation.description: Reservations can be canceled with at least 48 hours' notice to receive a full refund. Cancellations made with less than 48 hours' notice will not be refundable. We reserve the right to cancel reservations for safety, availability, or non-compliance with the Terms.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: The company shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services or the inability to use them. This limitation of liability shall apply to the extent permitted by law.

modifications.title: Modifications to the Terms
modifications.description: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. The modifications will be effective immediately after their publication on our website. It is the user's responsibility to regularly review the updated Terms.

jurisdiction.title: Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.description: These Terms shall be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of Cuba. Any disputes arising in connection with these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Havana.
